item.description:
Boston SEO & Affiliate Internet Marketing Networking Group.

We invite local Boston seo, affiliate marketing and search engine marketing professionals in New England area to join us.

Robbins Library
700 Massachusetts Avenue
Arlington, MA 02476
ph 781-316-3200

@ Community Room that holds a 100 people

Take The elevator to the basement

Parking: Try on Mass Ave if not there is a lot across the street behind Bank of America & Not Your Average Joe's restaurant

Agenda:

6:30pm to 7pm: Open Networking & FOOD from sponsor CentersAndSquares.com

Business Card Buffet: drop you card on the networking buffet

7pm to 7:45: 2 Min Elevator Pitch:

* Tell us about you and your business or website interest
* Any networking goal your trying to achieve out of this meeting?

7:45 to 8:15pm: Guest Speaker:

Speaker Topic: Social Media & Twitter

About Stuart Foster
Principal at The Lost Jacket and Strategist at Mullen. Stuart is knowledgeable and passionate about PR, Marketing, and Social Media. He is currently a Social Media Strategist at Mullen and is also consulting with Street Attack. Stuart has worked with brands like Global Post, Ask.com, and Zico.

About The Lost Jacket

Social Media, PR & Marketing Blog

The Lost Jacket is a blog based out of Boston, MA focused on social media, public relations, marketing and brand management for businesses. It is currently a ranked marketing blog at AdAge’s Power150. It is also currently listed as a “best of” resource for social media and marketing and can be found on the Social Media section of Alltop.com. Stuart and Carla are featured at BrazenCareerist.com and Stuart is a regular guest author at Ragan.com and Mashable.

Twitter: @StuartFoster

Speaker Topic: Social Media & Twitter


8:15 to 8:45pm Open Round Table Discussion


8:45pm The End

We look forward to seeing you all at this informal Boston search engine round table discussion!


The Cambridge SEO MeetUp

----------------------------------
Guest Speaker's Wanted For December 7th & 2010

We've been working hard to find industry experts and to develop a formal agenda to keep it interesting for all those that attend at this new big meeting room.

Food Event Sponsors:

SEO Pro's, will work for food! Contact us about sponsoring the next event with goodies and drinks in exchange for publicity. www.BostonSEO.org/Sponsor

group.name: The Cambridge Search Engine Optimization Meetup Group

item.name: Boston SEO / Internet Marketing Networking Event
